Headline: #95 95th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 91st/Burley
ShortDescription: Eastbound 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd and Buffalo: due to street blockage near 91st/Burley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd and Buffalo: due to street blockage near 91st/Burley.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed Racine
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
